channel.title: Error on run.bat
channel.description:
This is what i have on my run.bat
@echo off title Ghostscape! java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
when i run it i get this error..
Error occurred during initialization of VM java/lang/NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/Object Press any key to continue . . .
And my aouto restarter i put
@echo off java server pause
and when i ran it i got htis error
Error occurred during initialization of VM java/lang/NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/Object Press any key to continue . . .
whoever helps me get this right i offer rep++ and mod on my server
